entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 9:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.0°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: SE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 8:17 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:17 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 8:17 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
